description:
Ken and his class take a trip to Hokkaido, where they`re attacked by a Juralian mummy riding in a horse drawn carriage. Good thing Ken never leaves home without his trusty Alpha Gun!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kyoufu! Miira ga Basha de Yatte Kuru
Terror! The Mummy Comes by Carriage!
恐怖! ミイラが馬車でやってくる
